original_title: Earth Report: State of the Planet 2007
overview: On April 27th, at 2pm, National Geographic is using a version of the  Environmental Performance Index to take a "pulse" of how countries are  performing in regards to their environmental stewardship of the planet.  Please forward this video to those you love, our planet Earth needs you. We don't have a moment to waste. Let's love and protect our Mother Planet now
title: Earth Report: State of the Planet 2007
